content.question: According to the article, which of the following statements is true?

choices.label: The event will not be held again for another four years.
Guests are encouraged to preregister several months in advance.
Guests focus mainly on current global affairs at the event.
The event was started by an intergovernmental organization.

content.answer: The event was started by an intergovernmental organization.

unit.text: 2: The Influence of Language and Culture on Identity

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Determine the meaning of familiar and unfamiliar words.
